*{-o-box-sizing:border-box;-ms-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box;line-height:normal}body,html{margin:0;padding:0}#attentive_overlay{display:none}.rewards-wrapper{background-color:#eee}.rewards-wrapper div.app-bar{width:100%;padding:0;position:relative;z-index:3;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper div.app-bar img{width:100%;height:auto;display:block;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper .chip{margin:50px 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.1);color:#0099eb}.rewards-wrapper div.btn-wrapper a.disabled{opacity:.7}.rewards-wrapper .rewards-info{width:100%;margin:0;background-color:#2b3036;display:block;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper h2.section-heading{width:100%;margin:0 h2.section-heading:after{width:60px;height:3px;margin:4px auto;background-color:#cd212b;content:"";display:block;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper strong{font-weight:700}.rewards-wrapper h2.info-heading{width:100%;border-top:1px solid #14171a;padding-top:24px}.info-panel-wrapper h2.section-heading{color:#c4ced3}.rewards-wrapper form>.btn{margin:32px auto 16px;padding:12px 16px;border:0;border-radius:2px;font-size:14px;display:inline-block;overflow:hidden;cursor:pointer;transition:all .25s ease-out}.rewards-wrapper form>.btn:hover{box-shadow:0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.rewards-wrapper form>.btn.disabled{opacity:.5;pointer-events:none}.rewards-wrapper input[type=submit]{background-color:transparent;border:2px solid #dd2b35;border-radius:22px;box-shadow:0;color:#dd2b35;font-size:16px;line-height:1;text-transform:uppercase;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.rewards-wrapper input[type=submit]:hover{background-color:#dd2b35;color:#fff}.rewards-wrapper input[type=submit]:focus{outline:2px dashed #2b3036}.rewards-wrapper input[type=submit]:focus-visible{outline:4px dashed #2b3036}.rewards-wrapper input[type=submit]:focus:not(:focus-visible){outline:none;box-shadow:1px 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.7)}#rewards-form{margin:0 auto;padding:20px;background-color:#fff;border-bottom:2px solid #d9d9d9;border-radius:2px;font-family:Roboto,Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-weight:400;box-shadow:0 6px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.3);position:relative;top:-50px;z-index:3;overflow:hidden;transition:height .3s ease-out}#rewards-form table:after,#rewards-form table:before{display:none}#rewards-form table{position:relative;display:grid;border-collapse:collapse;border:2px solid #cd212b;min-width:100%;grid-template-columns:3fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 2fr;place-content:center;place-items:center;text-align:center;border-radius:16px;background-color:#dd2b35;color:#fff}#rewards-form th{font-size:20px;padding:16px 0;text-align:center}#rewards-form thead,tbody,tr{display:contents}#rewards-form td:after,#rewards-form td:before{display:none}#rewards-form td{padding:8px;width:100%;height:100%;display:grid;place-content:center}.reward-item input{width:100%;padding:8px;background-color:#e0e0e0;border:0;font-size:14px;vertical-align:top;color:#000}.reward-item input::-moz-placeholder{color:#000}.reward-item input:-ms-input-placeholder{color:#000}.reward-item input::placeholder{color:#000}tr:nth-child(odd) td{background:rgba(0,0,0,.1)}tr:nth-child(2n) td{background:rgba(0,0,0,.3)}tr:last-child td:first-child{border-radius:0 0 0 16px}tr:last-child td:last-child{border-radius:0 0 16px 0}#rewards-form .rewards-inner .reward-item,#rewards-form .rewards-inner .reward-item-legend{width:100%;overflow:hidden}.reward-item input.input-error{background-color:#ffc0c0}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper{width:100%;margin:24px 0 0;background-color:#f2f2f2;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;font-size:18px;overflow:hidden;transition:all .3s ease-out}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper.negative{margin:12px 0 0;background-color:#ffc0c0;border-color:#ff8d8d}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper span{padding:16px;float:left}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper span.balance{float:right}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper.negative span.balance{background-color:#ff9c9c;color:#f30000}#rewards-form .error-msg{width:100%;margin:20px 0;padding:10px 0 0;position:relative;overflow:hidden;will-change:transform;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}#rewards-form .error-msg.hidden{display:none;will-change:transform;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}#rewards-form .error-msg h3{padding:16px;background-color:#cd212b;color:#fff;font-size:18px;will-change:transform;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}.rewards-wrapper .reward-details{width:100%;margin:20px 0;padding:0;list-style:none;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper .reward-details li{width:100%;background-color:#fff;border-bottom:1px solid #e9e9e9;display:block;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper .reward-details li h3,.rewards-wrapper .reward-details li p{width:100%;margin:0;padding:8px 12px;font-family:Roboto Slab,Vitesse,Rockwell,serif}.rewards-wrapper .reward-details li h3{color:#cd212b;font-family:sw4,Roboto,Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;line-height:1.4}.rewards-wrapper .reward-details li p{font-size:15px}.rewards-wrapper p.disclaimer{width:100%;max-width:800px;margin:24px auto;padding:15px;font-family:Roboto Slab,Vitesse,Rockwell,serif;font-size:16px;line-height:1.6}.rewards-wrapper .message,.rewards-wrapper .static-message{max-width:700px;margin:24px auto;padding:16px;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #cfcfcf;border-radius:2px;box-shadow:0 3px 10px h3{color:#2b3036}.rewards-wrapper .message:before,.rewards-wrapper .static-message:before{width:12%;margin:0;padding:12% 0 0;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:100% 100%;position:relative;content:"";display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;overflow:hidden}.rewards-wrapper .message.question:before,.rewards-wrapper .message:before,.rewards-wrapper .static-message.question:before,.rewards-wrapper .static-message:before{background-image:url(http://i.cdn.turner.com/nba/nba/.element/media/2.0/teamsites/rockets/1516_renewals/opt-out/_images/question_icon.svg)}.rewards-wrapper .message.error,.rewards-wrapper .static-message.error{background-image:none!important}.rewards-wrapper .message.error:before,.rewards-wrapper .static-message.error:before{background-image:url(http://i.cdn.turner.com/nba/nba/.element/media/2.0/teamsites/rockets/1516_renewals/opt-out/_images/error_icon.svg)}.rewards-wrapper .message.success:before,.rewards-wrapper .static-message.success:before{background-image:url(http://i.cdn.turner.com/nba/nba/.element/media/2.0/teamsites/rockets/1516_renewals/opt-out/_images/success_icon.svg)}.rewards-wrapper .static-message.error:before{opacity:.4}.premium-asterisk{display:none}body.premium span.premium-asterisk{display:inline-block!important}body.premium small.premium-asterisk{display:block!important}.modal{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.6);display:none;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;z-index:10}.modal.show-modal{display:block}#error,#success{position:absolute;overflow:hidden;box-shadow:0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,.3);background-color:#dd2b35;padding:8px 32px;color:#fff;top:45%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);max-width:100%;width:800px;-webkit-animation-name:modalopen;animation-name:modalopen;-webkit-animation-duration:.6s;animation-duration:.6s}#error{font-style:italic}.modal h3{font-weight:400;font-size:24px;color:#fff;line-height:1.25}@-webkit-keyframes modalopen{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes modalopen{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@media screen and (min-width:991px){.rewards-wrapper .rewards-info{padding-bottom:70px}.rewards-wrapper h3{font-size:18px}.rewards-wrapper .rewards-info .rewards-summary{width:30%;padding:0;border:1px solid .reward-details,.rewards-wrapper p.disclaimer{margin:20px auto}.rewards-wrapper p.disclaimer{width:80%;margin:20px auto}.rewards-wrapper .reward-details{max-width:800px}.rewards-wrapper .chip{width:700px}}@media screen and (max-width:990px){.rewards-wrapper .rewards-info{padding-bottom:70px}.rewards-wrapper h3{font-size:18px}.rewards-wrapper .info-panel-wrapper{width:95%;grid-gap:12px}.rewards-wrapper .rewards-info li span.title{font-size:20px}.rewards-wrapper .rewards-info li span.def{font-size:18px;max-width:100px}.rewards-wrapper .chip{width:80%}#rewards-form{width:98%}#rewards-form table{grid-template-columns:3fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr}#rewards-form th{font-size:26px;border-bottom:none}#rewards-form table>*{font-size:24px}#rewards-form .total{padding-right:48px}#rewards-form td{padding:8px 4px 8px 8px;font-size:24px}.reward-item input{font-size:20px;margin:4px}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper{font-size:30px}#rewards-form .error-msg h3,.rewards-wrapper input[type=submit]{font-size:24px}}@media screen and (max-width:639px){.rewards-wrapper .chip{width:90%}#rewards-form{width:100%;margin:0 0 50px;top:0;position:static;padding:0}#rewards-form table{grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);width:-webkit-fit-content;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content}#rewards-form th{font-size:14px;word-wrap:normal}#rewards-form td,.reward-item input{font-size:14px}#rewards-form .total{padding-right:12px}#rewards-form table>*{font-size:36px}#rewards-form .balance-wrapper{font-size:24px}#rewards-form .error-msg h3{font-size:20px}}
